captions.text: You gotta be stronger cause you’re my star
You gotta be stronger cause you’re my star
I think about you and regret, I miss you
Me, who didn't want to say a word
And you who seemed and sounded indifferent
to me leaving
You're a bad girl, I'm a bad boy
Maybe we've been so from the start
Why have we obsessed over a relationship already lost
Why did we say things we didn't mean
Even when we kept fighting, why did we call it love
I tried so hard to change my habits
but you continued to look so down
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?
Everything is changing
Ever since I let you go
and how I might look without you
It all drives me crazy
Our wounds are growing deeper
More flaws we see in each other
We tried to find what's good
but maybe that was the trap
Not a cloud in the sky today
The weather is a ten out of ten
Nothing has changed, except you're not with me
This is breaking up, this is the reality
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?
Another day changes and so do I
Life was better back when I could argue with you
It was better back then
Come back please
It's not easy for me to get over you right now
Not as easy as it sounds
I'm crazy, I'm crazy my girl
Are you crying like I am?
Are you listening to our song?
It's not easy, it's not easy, it's not easy
How about for you?

comments.author: M Smith

comments.text:
Confession: Chunji was always my least favorite.... it seemed he had a very 
high opinion of himself, his vocals, and his looks. IMO, Niel has more 
passionate vocals and, to me, *every* other member is more attractive with 
their single eyelids or their distinctive stand-out personalities. But this 
dance video makes me realize that Chunji is actually a very smooth 
performer and an elegant dancer; far beyond the "I wanna be Nichkhun" 
perception that I had of him.  Andy Lee really lucked out with this set of 
six kids; they're all masterpieces.﻿

comments.author: Love Niel

comments.text:
I said the same thing in one of their other videos - their songs are 
nothing astounding (in that I don't find myself really listening to the 
songs) but their performances demand attention.

The first part by Niel almost made me want to stop listening. "you gotta be 
stronger cause you're my star..." and the I'm crazy, I'm crazy, my girl 
also makes me cringe a bit, but the rest of the song sounds really good. 
There's so much emotion in Niel's part in the chorus; his voice is best 
suited for things like that. Everyone else was good too and should be 
proud.﻿
